ISSUE.TITLE: Failure to build deps on fresh vagrant environment
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Building the vagrant environment from scratch on the `exp` branch results in the following error:- ``` # which npm && npm -g install uglify-js less go get github.com/GeertJohan/go.rice/rice go list github.com/drone/drone/... | xargs go get -t -v github.com/drone/drone/cmd/droned # github.com/drone/drone/cmd/droned runtime.main: call to external function main.main runtime.main: undefined: main.main make: *** [deps] Error 123 ``` It looks like something is expecting to find droned.main which appears to have been removed. Any idea what the background is here?

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: [code-798]: fix code comment issue where it stays (#397)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: [code-821]: redirect to space after creation (#408)
